content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No existing structures to report.

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing. This can be caused by existing entities or unplaceable terrain like water.
### Errors when placing entities that are too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place something before placing it. The maximum distance is 10.
### Missing item in inventory
- Ensure that the item you are trying to place is present in the inventory

NAMESPACE
No defined utility functions or assigned variables to report.
```
